gameDetails.name: The 7th Continent: Swamp of Madness
gameDetails.description:
The savages call it A’hemDaar. Its name is spoken by them with fear and is seen as a bad omen. You have been warned: you are a tiny, tiny thing out there.

This Kickstarter-exclusive expansion contains 96 additional cards that will increase the size of the Continent and offer you a new curse to unravel!
